remarks: Define an enumeration of a set from a choice function; second part, it restricts to a bijection. _EDITORIAL_: overlaps ~ dfac8a (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dnnumch.f $e |- F = recs ( ( z e. _V |-> ( G ` ( A \ ran z ) ) ) ) $.
dnnumch.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
dnnumch.g $e |- ( ph -> A. y e. ~P A ( y =/= (/) -> ( G ` y ) e. y ) ) $.
dnnumch1 $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. On ( F |` x ) : x -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y z $.
$d ph x $.
